list_definition.definition: (able to produce ideas which are) new, fresh or not thought of before

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has a very original mind.

list_definition.definition: (of a painting etc) by the artist etc, from which copies may be made

list_definition.definition: a model from which a painting etc is made

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She is the original of the famous portrait.
